headline: Bernstein Upgrades Newmont (NEM) to Outperform, Sets $157 Target Price
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the Top 10 Stocks Warren Buffett Would Buy in 2026. On February 27, 2026, Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) saw its rating from Bernstein upgraded from Market Perform to Outperform. The firm’s analyst Bob Brackett set a price target of $157. The research note cited the firm’s bullish view on gold […]
